sentences.en: Some Republicans accused the lightbulb brigade of extremism.
sentences.cn: 一些共和党人指责那些极端主义的灯泡一派。

sentences.en: A computer tube can hold a lot more gasoline than a lightbulb.
sentences.cn: 电脑显示器的电子管可比小小的灯泡能装多了。

sentences.en: When a lightbulb burns out, we rarely give it a second thought.
sentences.cn: 当一个灯泡烧掉了，我们很少会在它身上再去多费心思。
